name: D_CODE
description:
l] _ [ Ø l] 3    is a school project affiliated to the 'IIM Summer Jam'

Based on the theme "jargon", our game puts the player in a hacker's shoes. Your goal is to crack the code to gain access to a computer. 

The password is written using ASCII characters, incomprehensible computer's jargon. You'll have to translate characters one at a time until you figure out the password. To crack a letter, you simply have to go through short challenges based on your reaction time. 

Succeed and you will gain access to much powerful softwares such as itunes, internet explorer or the trash can.

Designed, developped and produced by Zoom Zoom Studios

Music credits
